title: Family decision-making about care arrangements and boundaries
description: Family decision-making about care arrangements and boundaries
content:
Scenario: Family decision-making about care arrangements and boundaries
    Given care arrangements affect multiple family members
    And boundaries need to be negotiated and maintained
    When the family discusses care commitments and changes
    Then the family_elohim should facilitate clear communication
    And it should help family make decisions that respect all members
    And Margaret's capacity and boundaries should be honored
    And Sarah's parenting authority should be respected
    And care arrangements should be mutually agreed upon
    And family governance should be participatory and equitable
    And decisions should serve the flourishing of all generations
